comments.body: This is a meta comment: we are replacing skipped metrics with `dropped` metrics here, are we going to add it later? Originally I thought we are going to depend on the metrics to pass in different sensors (their level is also different, e.g. the `dropped` would be at task-level), but since I do not see it here I'd like to clarify with you.

This is kind of a temporary solution. In the task-level metrics refactoring, I will introduce method `droppedRecordsSensorOrSkippedRecordsSensor()` that chooses which sensor to create depending on the version.
